channel.title: About .java files
channel.description:
Hello! hey i got a question, if i edit any .java file i need compile all again? because i edit the client.java, the plater.java and when i start the server i no see any change.
PD: using 317 TestScape

item.title: About .java files
item.dc:creator: @raiden123 raiden123
item.description:
@raiden123 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:4, topic:344202”] @echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit
Works for me and I got update 20[/quote]

Error, it says that i don’t have the JDK, but i have it in a folder called Program Files NOT programfiles i need change that? or what?

PD: i’m using a spanish computer, for that i create the folder Program Files and install java in that folder, but my original data folder is called “Archivos de Programa”

Read full topic

item.title: About .java files
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

this is your compiler code then:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: About .java files
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

@echo off
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Works for me and I got update 20

Read full topic
